languages.text: "Признаться, странно не ощущать более давящую тяжесть на сердце. Порой я радуюсь обретенной свободе, а порой..." {n}Кассия прикрывает рубиновые глаза.{/n} "... чувствую себя опустошенной. Словно вместе с Атласом пропала и часть меня".

traits.locale_text: "Признаться, странно не ощущать более давящую тяжесть на сердце. Порой я радуюсь обретенной свободе, а порой..." {n}Кассия прикрывает рубиновые глаза.{/n} "... чувствую себя опустошенной. Словно вместе с Атласом пропала и часть меня".

languages.text: "I... I must confess, it is strange no longer feeling the heaviness pressing on my heart. Sometimes my newfound freedom makes me happy, and sometimes—" {n}Cassia half-closes her ruby-red eyes.{/n} "—I feel hollow. As if a part of me had vanished along with the Atlas."
languages.original_text: "Признаться, странно не ощущать более давящую тяжесть на сердце. Порой я радуюсь обретенной свободе, а порой..." {n}Кассия прикрывает рубиновые глаза.{/n} "... чувствую себя опустошенной. Словно вместе с Атласом пропала и часть меня".

traits.locale_text: "I must confess it's strange, no longer feeling the heaviness pressing on my heart. Sometimes my newfound freedom makes me happy, and sometimes—" {n}Cassia half-closes her ruby-red eyes.{/n} "—I feel hollow. As if a part of me were gone along with the Atlas."

"I must confess it's strange, no longer feeling the heaviness pressing on my heart. Sometimes my newfound freedom makes me happy, and sometimes—" {n}Cassia half-closes her ruby-red eyes.{/n} "—I feel hollow. As if a part of me were gone along with the Atlas."

"I must confess, it's strange no longer feeling the heaviness pressing on my heart. Sometimes my newfound freedom makes me happy, and sometimes—" {n}Cassia half-closes her ruby-red eyes.{/n} "—I feel hollow. As if a part of me had vanished along with the Atlas."

"I must confess, it's strange no longer feeling the heaviness pressing on my heart. Sometimes my newfound freedom makes me happy, and sometimes—" {n}Cassia half-closes her ruby-red eyes.{/n} "—I feel hollow. As if a part of me had vanished along with the Atlas."

"I must confess, it's strange no longer feeling the heaviness pressing on my heart. Sometimes my newfound freedom makes me happy, and sometimes—" {n}Cassia half-closes her ruby-red eyes.{/n} "—I feel hollow. As if a part of me had vanished along with the Atlas."

languages.text: “我必须承认，一直压在我心头的沉重感消失了，这种感觉很古怪。有的时候，这种全新的自由让我感到很开心。还有的时候——”{n}卡西娅半闭着她红宝石般的眼睛。{/n}“——我会感到空虚，仿佛我的一部分与圣仪一起消失了。”
languages.original_text: "I must confess, it's strange no longer feeling the heaviness pressing on my heart. Sometimes my newfound freedom makes me happy, and sometimes—" {n}Cassia half-closes her ruby-red eyes.{/n} "—I feel hollow. As if a part of me had vanished along with the Atlas."

traits.locale_text: “我必须承认，一直压在我心头的沉重感消失了，这种感觉很古怪。有的时候，这种全新的自由让我感到很开心。还有的时候——”{n}卡西娅半闭着她红宝石般的眼睛。{/n}“——我会感到空虚，仿佛我的一部分与圣仪一起消失了。”

languages.original_text: "I must confess, it's strange no longer feeling the heaviness pressing on my heart. Sometimes my newfound freedom makes me happy, and sometimes—" {n}Cassia half-closes her ruby-red eyes.{/n} "—I feel hollow. As if a part of me had vanished along with the Atlas."

languages.text: «Debo confesar que se me hace raro no tener ese peso sobre mi corazón. En ocasiones mi nueva libertad me llena de alegría, pero en otras...». {n}Cassia entrecierra sus ojos de color rubí.{/n} «... me siento vacía, como si parte de mí hubiera desaparecido junto con el Atlas».
languages.original_text: "I... I must confess, it is strange no longer feeling the heaviness pressing on my heart. Sometimes my newfound freedom makes me happy, and sometimes—" {n}Cassia half-closes her ruby-red eyes.{/n} "—I feel hollow. As if a part of me had vanished along with the Atlas."

traits.locale_text: «Debo confesar que se me hace raro no tener ese peso sobre mi corazón. En ocasiones mi nueva libertad me llena de alegría, pero en otras...». {n}Cassia entrecierra sus ojos de color rubí.{/n} «... me siento vacía, como si parte de mí hubiera desaparecido junto con el Atlas».

languages.text: 「正直なところ、胸が締め付けられるような重苦しさを感じなくなったのは不思議な気分です。新しい自由は私を幸せにすることも、時には…」{n}カシアはルビーのような赤い目を半分閉じた。{/n}「…空虚な気分にすることもあります。アトラスと一緒に私の一部が消えてしまったような心地です」
languages.original_text: "I must confess, it's strange no longer feeling the heaviness pressing on my heart. Sometimes my newfound freedom makes me happy, and sometimes—" {n}Cassia half-closes her ruby-red eyes.{/n} "—I feel hollow. As if a part of me had vanished along with the Atlas."

traits.locale_text: 「正直なところ、胸が締め付けられるような重苦しさを感じなくなったのは不思議な気分です。新しい自由は私を幸せにすることも、時には…」{n}カシアはルビーのような赤い目を半分閉じた。{/n}「…空虚な気分にすることもあります。アトラスと一緒に私の一部が消えてしまったような心地です」

languages.text: "Ich muss gestehen, es ist merkwürdig, die Schwere nicht mehr auf meinem Herzen zu spüren. Manchmal macht meine neu gewonnene Freiheit mich glücklich, und manchmal"{n}, Cassia schließt ihre rubinroten Augen halb,{/n} "fühle ich mich leer. Als wäre ein Teil von mir zusammen mit dem Atlas verschwunden."
languages.original_text: "I... I must confess, it is strange no longer feeling the heaviness pressing on my heart. Sometimes my newfound freedom makes me happy, and sometimes—" {n}Cassia half-closes her ruby-red eyes.{/n} "—I feel hollow. As if a part of me had vanished along with the Atlas."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss gestehen, es ist merkwürdig, die Schwere nicht mehr auf meinem Herzen zu spüren. Manchmal macht meine neu gewonnene Freiheit mich glücklich, und manchmal"{n}, Cassia schließt ihre rubinroten Augen halb,{/n} "fühle ich mich leer. Als wäre ein Teil von mir zusammen mit dem Atlas verschwunden."

languages.text: « Je dois avouer que ne plus ressentir ce poids sur mon cœur est une sensation des plus étranges. Parfois, cette liberté nouvelle m'emplit de joie, mais... de temps en temps, je me sens vide, {n}dit Cassia en fermant à moitié ses yeux rubis.{/n} Comme si une partie de moi s'était évaporée avec l'Atlas. »
languages.original_text: "I... I must confess, it is strange no longer feeling the heaviness pressing on my heart. Sometimes my newfound freedom makes me happy, and sometimes—" {n}Cassia half-closes her ruby-red eyes.{/n} "—I feel hollow. As if a part of me had vanished along with the Atlas."

traits.locale_text: « Je dois avouer que ne plus ressentir ce poids sur mon cœur est une sensation des plus étranges. Parfois, cette liberté nouvelle m'emplit de joie, mais... de temps en temps, je me sens vide, {n}dit Cassia en fermant à moitié ses yeux rubis.{/n} Comme si une partie de moi s'était évaporée avec l'Atlas. »

languages.text: "İtiraf etmeliyim ki artık göğsüme bir taş oturduğunu hissetmemek tuhaf geliyor. Bu yeni elde ettiğim özgürlük bazen beni mutlu ederken bazense..." {n}Cassia, yakut kırmızısı gözlerini kısmen kapatıyor.{/n} "İçim boş hissediyorum. Atlas'la birlikte benden bir parça kaybolup gitmiş gibi."
languages.original_text: "I... I must confess, it is strange no longer feeling the heaviness pressing on my heart. Sometimes my newfound freedom makes me happy, and sometimes—" {n}Cassia half-closes her ruby-red eyes.{/n} "—I feel hollow. As if a part of me had vanished along with the Atlas."

traits.locale_text: "İtiraf etmeliyim ki artık göğsüme bir taş oturduğunu hissetmemek tuhaf geliyor. Bu yeni elde ettiğim özgürlük bazen beni mutlu ederken, bazense..." {n}Cassia, yakut kırmızısı gözlerini kısmen kapatıyor.{/n} "...İçim boş hissediyorum. Atlas'la birlikte benim bir parçam da kaybolup gitmiş gibi."
